meanings.definition: A Middle Eastern dish made from ground chickpeas or fava beans formed into balls or patties and deep-fried.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed the crispy falafels at the food festival.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant served delicious falafels with tahini sauce.
meanings.sent3: The falafels danced in the hot oil as they turned golden brown.
meanings.sent4: Her falafels of wisdom were always a hit at family gatherings.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly fried falafels filled the kitchen.
